page.title: 05Radley Opinion Survey
page.content: Most people asked have moved into Radley from somewhere else. The majority of people have lived in Radley for under 5 years. Most people work outside the village. Not many people travel less than 5 miles to work. Many people think that Radley has changed in their time here, with new housing and the noise and roads, but the opinion was mixed as to the value of these changes. Most people think Radley is a friendly village, with enough leisure and child-centred amenities, and enough shops. Most of our survey were certain that Radley should not be made bigger with either housing or shops. A minority regretted the absence of a Youth Club, and felt that the Parish or the local Council should provide more holiday facilities for the young. About a third of our sample wanted more variety of shops.
